## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [ANCHOR\_RADIUS](./blockly.bubble_class.anchor_radius_property.md) | <code>static</code> | number | Distance between arrow point and anchor point. |
|  [ARROW\_ANGLE](./blockly.bubble_class.arrow_angle_property.md) | <code>static</code> | number | The number of degrees that the arrow bends counter-clockwise. |
|  [ARROW\_BEND](./blockly.bubble_class.arrow_bend_property.md) | <code>static</code> | number | The sharpness of the arrow's bend. Higher numbers result in smoother arrows. |
|  [ARROW\_THICKNESS](./blockly.bubble_class.arrow_thickness_property.md) | <code>static</code> | number | Determines the thickness of the base of the arrow in relation to the size of the bubble. Higher numbers result in thinner arrows. |
|  [BORDER\_WIDTH](./blockly.bubble_class.border_width_property.md) | <code>static</code> | number | Width of the border around the bubble. |
|  [content\_](./blockly.bubble_class.content__property.md) |  | SVGElement |  |
|  [shape\_](./blockly.bubble_class.shape__property.md) |  | SVGElement |  |
